contentList.content: Metamagic: Detached Spell

Removes concentration requirement.

Costs [1] Sorcery Point per spell slot level used.
Metamagic: Empowered Spell

Rerolls spell damage die rolls that are 1, 2 or 3 to increase the chances of high damage rolls.

Regardless of the outcome, the new rolls will be used.

Costs [1] Sorcery Point per spell.
Metamagic: Expanded Spell

Doubles the radius of area spells.

Costs [1] Sorcery Point per spell slot level used.

Gives Advantage on Attack Rolls.

Exploit: Quickened Spell

Exploited spells channel raw Weave through the body of the caster to quicken spells.

The process consumes [1] Sorcery Point but hurt the invoker, causing [2] per Spell Level.
